head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COHEN, LILLIAN, LEE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COHEN, LILLIAN, LEE

block.p: COHEN-Lillian-Lee, on July 13, 2000 at the Calvary Hospital. Born in Philadelphia, PA. on December 15, 1919 to Thomas and Ida Aron. Mrs. Cohen worked as an artist for Prentice-Hall Publishing Co. in New Jersey. Beloved wife of Dr. Leonard Cohen. Also survived by children, Jonathan Opas, Evan Opas, step-children, Mark Cohen and Lori Klein, sister, Minna Sand, and 7 grandchildren. Predeceased by a brother Alex Aron. Services will be held today 12:30 at the Zion Memorial Chapel, 785 E. Boston Post Rd, Mamaroneck followed by interment at Cedar Park Cemetery in Westwood, N.J. For info or directions please call (914) 381-1809 or www.zionmemorialchapel.com
